summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3908 for the improvement of the alley in block 34, Pontius' Addition being the alley between Bellevue Avenue North and Melrose Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East Harrison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47611, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
